DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of dutogliptin in Type 2 diabetic subjects with moderate or severe renal impairment.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Dutogliptin in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Subjects With Moderate and Severe Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Renal impairment (moderate and severe) Currently on stable doses of background medication of SU, TZD, acarbose, meglitinide, insulin or any combination thereof, or on no antidiabetic drugs at all HbA1c 7.0% 10.5%, inclusive Male or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 85 years, inclusive. Type 1 diabetes mellitus or history of diabetic ketoacidosis, mature onset diabetes of the young (MODY) Kidney transplant
